page.title: 03A S.CROYDON CHILD
page.content: A typical child from the Ridgeway School,Sanderstead, lives in a semi_detached home with double glazing,central heating,T.V.,a washing machine and tumble drier.His parents have one or two cars. It is likely that his father works in some type of engineering or finance in London,and ,if his mother works,it is probably locally doing secretarial work. There may be only two children in the family,and they have many hobbies and interests.About half of them will play a musical instrument,have swimming lessons and be in the cubs or brownies.They will enjoy all sports,and will watch television about 10 hours a week if in the first year, and 18 hours a week in the third year.
